name: Silencio
description: Silencio powers voice AI, robotics, AR/VR, and spatial intelligence with ethically sourced, user-owned audio data at scale. With over 1.1 million users and >41 billion datapoints contributed, we are building the foundational layer for machine hearing. The market for real-world audio intelligence is projected to exceed $100 billion by 2030, fueled by virtual assistants, healthcare, robotics, and support systems. As demand for field data surges, Silencio is positioned as the go-to audio layer, capable of capturing any language, in any corner of the world. We transform everyday devices into a decentralized network of real-world audio sensors. Unlike traditional data models that extract information without consent, every datapoint is contributed voluntarily. Participation is always opt-in, anonymized, and rewarded, ensuring privacy and transparency. Silencio stands at the forefront of the Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks (DePIN) movement, setting new standards for community-driven data collection, transparency, and environmental impact.
